name: experienceclub-monorepo
description: eCommerce monorepo with Next.js frontend/admin and NestJS backend

scripts.instalss: npm install -w backend && npm install -w frontend && npm install -w admin
scripts.migratess: npm run pgenerate -w backend && npm run ppush -w backend && npm run pmigrate -w backend
scripts.buildss: npm run build -w backend && npm run build -w frontend && npm run build -w admin
scripts.deployss: npm run deploy-back -w backend && npm run deploy-front -w frontend && npm run deploy-admin -w admin
scripts.build: npm run build -w backend && npm run build -w frontend && npm run build -w admin
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run docker:build && echo '✅ All applications and Docker images built!'
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:frontend && npm run test:admin
scripts.prisma:migrate:dev: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.prisma:migrate:deploy: cd backend && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.prisma:migrate:reset: cd backend && npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.prisma:db:push: cd backend && npx prisma db push
scripts.prisma:db:pull: cd backend && npx prisma db pull
scripts.seed: docker-compose exec -T backend npm run seed
scripts.seed:full: docker-compose exec -T backend npm run seed
scripts.populate: npm run docker:seed && echo '✅ Database populated with all products and images!'
scripts.populate:with-images: npm run docker:migrate:images && npm run docker:seed && echo '✅ Images migrated and database populated!'
scripts.populate:from-php: npm run docker:migrate:php-images && npm run docker:seed && echo '✅ PHP images migrated and database populated!'
scripts.seed:all: npm run populate:with-images && echo '✅ All database seeded and images migrated!'
scripts.docker:exec:db: docker-compose exec postgres psql -U experienceclub -d experienceclub
scripts.docker:migrate: docker-compose exec -T backend npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.docker:migrate:dev: docker-compose exec -T backend npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.docker:migrate:reset: docker-compose exec -T backend npx prisma migrate reset --force
scripts.docker:generate: docker-compose exec -T backend npx prisma generate
scripts.docker:seed: docker-compose exec -T backend npm run seed
scripts.docker:seed:admin: docker-compose exec -T backend npm run seed:admin
scripts.docker:seed:perfumes: docker-compose exec -T backend npm run seed:perfumes
scripts.docker:migrate:images: docker-compose exec -T backend npm run migrate:images
scripts.docker:migrate:php-images: docker-compose exec -T backend npm run migrate:php-images
scripts.docker:migrate:product-images-to-image-s: docker-compose exec -T backend npm run migrate:product-images-to-image-system
scripts.clean: npm run clean -w backend && npm run clean -w frontend && npm run clean -w admin
scripts.clean:all: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf backend/node_modules backend/dist && rm -rf frontend/node_modules frontend/.next && rm -rf admin/node_modules admin/.next && echo '✅ All node_modules, .next and dist folders cleaned!'
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install -w backend && npm install -w frontend && npm install -w admin
scripts.reset: npm run docker:down && npm run docker:up && npm run docker:migrate:reset && npm run populate
scripts.reset:with-images: npm run docker:down && npm run docker:up && npm run docker:migrate:reset && npm run populate:with-images
scripts.fresh: npm run clean && npm run install:all && npm run docker:build && npm run setup
scripts.dev:exec:db: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec postgres psql -U experienceclub -d experienceclub
scripts.dev:migrate: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec -T backend npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.dev:migrate:reset: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec -T backend npx prisma migrate reset --force
scripts.dev:seed: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec -T backend npm run seed
scripts.dev:seed:admin: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec -T backend npm run seed:admin
scripts.dev:seed:perfumes: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec -T backend npm run seed:perfumes
scripts.deploy:migrate: docker-compose -f docker-compose.deploy.yml exec -T backend npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.deploy:migrate:reset: docker-compose -f docker-compose.deploy.yml exec -T backend npx prisma migrate reset --force
scripts.deploy:generate: docker-compose -f docker-compose.deploy.yml exec -T backend npx prisma generate
scripts.deploy:seed: docker-compose -f docker-compose.deploy.yml exec -T backend npm run seed
scripts.deploy:seed:admin: docker-compose -f docker-compose.deploy.yml exec -T backend npm run seed:admin
scripts.deploy:seed:perfumes: docker-compose -f docker-compose.deploy.yml exec -T backend npm run seed:perfumes
